publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2991 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIs-That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved- the Loch Lomond and the Trossachs National Park Elections (Scotland) Order 2002; the Loch Lomond and the Trossachs National Park Designation, Transitional and Consequential Provisions (Scotland) Order 2002; and the Bus User Complaints Tribunal Regulations 2002. Supported by: Euan Robson*
